creator: patjlm@online.fr
text:
It would be nice to be able to specify the SQL output encoding in the <sql> task.
There is already an 'encoding' attribute, but it is used only when loading input
script(s).
I guess it would be better to have a second attribute 'outputencoding' to allow
different inbound and outbound encoding.
<concat> already has such an attribute.
*** Bug 39542 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: patjlm@online.fr

text:
Created attachment 29573
adds outputEncoding to SQL task

probably only simple change like this is needed here
patch adds outputEncoding paraqmetere to <sql> task, default value is set to "UTF-8". Supported are all values accepted by constructor
PrintStream(OutputStream out, boolean autoFlush, String encoding)
